provisions.text:
Invalid Statute KRS 243.540
The link you have followed was to a version of a statute that was in effect at the time the document was prepared but has been superseded by a later version or repealed and is no longer valid.
For the current version of the statute, click KRS 243.540.
For the superseded version, contact the Reviser of Statutes by e-mail at reviser@lrc.ky.gov
